translations: [电讯]天线，[动]触角（antenna 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 电缆电视；公用天线电视
回路天线；环形天线；框形天线

sentences.sentence: To catch these waves, radio telescopes usually have huge antennas.
sentences.translation: 为了捕捉这些电波，电波望远镜通常都有巨大的天线。

sentences.sentence: The other part of the project is an undirected search which is monitoring all of space with a lower sensitivity, using the smaller antennas of NASA's Deep Space Network.
sentences.translation: 该项目的另一部分是无定向搜索，使用 NASA 深空网络的小型天线，以较低的灵敏度监测所有空间。

sentences.sentence: Most antennas are made in the shape of a dish to collect and reflect the radio waves to the sub reflector, in the same way as a curved mirror focuses visible light to one point.
sentences.translation: 大多数天线被制成碟形，用以收集和反射无线电波至亚反射器，就像曲面镜将可见光聚焦于一点一样。
